Text.Page: As you show an interest in alliances, Korino introduces you to the alliance recruiters.

Like most secrets, everyone knows about our secret research territory. So now some powerhouses have made alliances outside the federation's rule to control the mining and distribution of noctenium.

These powerhouses desire a pocket realm with their own access to noctenium. No one's tried to seize this one, so they must have found pocket realms of their own.

You want to join an alliance? I'm an expert on noctenium, not alliances. But if it'll get you out of my hair, I can send you to the cities where the alliances congregate.

Meet with a recruiter in Velika, Allemantheia, or Kaiator. I'm sure they'd love to sell you on their power-hungry groups. Which alliance do you think you're interested in?
I gave you a scroll to Velika. Teleport there and ask Robenit your questions about the Free Traders Collective.
You have a scroll to Allemantheia. You can teleport there and ask Lasri about the Enlightened Union.
Use the teleport scroll to Kaiator and ask Donnelly about the Iron Order.

Are you interested in an alliance?

Guild masters can join an alliance right away and the entire guild benefits. Guild members can only ask the guild master to make a good choice.

Do you have a preference? I'm sure your guild master will appreciate knowing that information.

Oh, you are interested in joining an alliance?

I can sign up guild masters right away. But guild members should discuss their preference with their guild master. Any guild master will appreciate such good information.

Interested in joining an alliance?

Only guild masters can join right away. For guild members, I suggest you talk to your guild master about which to join.
